text: Quiz 1 Chapter 6 Show your work. You must use the z-scores tables I provided. 1) What is the probability of less than 1.98? 2) What is the probability of more than 1.98? 3) What is the probability of more than -1.17? 4) What is the probability of less than 2.47? 5) What is the probability of between 0.82 and 2.13? 6) What probability (from the z-scores tables) is indicated by shading on the right side of -0.64? Page of 1 2 -0.64 Page of 2 2
